Redefining travel commerce

Search form

Search form

Travelport Smartpoint
The ultimate travel retail technology

Travelport Smartpoint is the ultimate travel retail technology for today’s connected digital age. It puts the world’s travel content at your fingertips and is packed with features that power better performance and enable you to create the perfect personalized service for your customers.

  • All the tools you need,
    all the tools you know
    Hear how travel agent Brooke made the move to Travelport Smartpoint and has never looked back.

    Learn more

  • Cryptic and powerful graphical tools work side-by-side
    Travel agents at Skywards Travel explain how combining cryptic with Travelport Smartpoint’s practical and user-friendly features help them to work smarter.

    Learn more

  • All the tools you need,
    all the tools you know
    Travel agents at Ng Chow explain how easy it is to customize their interfaces and P keys in Travelport Smartpoint.

    Learn more

  • Learn wherever and
    whenever you want
    With over 16 years of experience in the travel industry, Brenda tells us how Travelport Smartpoint’s online training made it easy for her to improve at her own pace.

    Learn more

  • Make the transition
    with ease today
    Haley and other travel agents at Boulevard Travel explain how Travelport Smartpoint’s user-friendly features help them to work smarter.

    Learn more

  • Smart new ways to
    book and sell travel
    Travel agents at Diversity Travel explain how Travelport Smartpoint helps them keep up-to-date with the latest traveler trends and lets them provide a truly personalized experience for their customers.

    Learn more

Upgrade NOW to the latest version of Travelport Smartpoint

As we continue to support you on your journey towards the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI DSS) compliance deadline (01 March 2018), we are pleased to inform you that Travelport Smartpoint 7.5 is now available which complies with the new PCI DSS compliance obligations.

 

Get the latest version of Travelport Smartpoint today

See what's new in
Travelport Smartpoint

Travelport Smartpoint for Travelport Worldspan

Discover What's new

Travelport Smartpoint for Travelport Apollo and Travelport Galileo

Discover What's new

Sell more airline content more often

Travelport Smartpoint lets you keep up-to-date with the widest range of real-time content from over 400 of the world's leading network airlines and low cost carriers, all from within your workflow.

Discover more about Sell more airline content more often

Upsell more hotel rooms and car rentals

With more than 650,000 unique hotel properties and 36,000 car rental locations available from within Travelport Smartpoint, you can be confident you're offering the right choices for your customers' unique needs.

Discover more about Upsell more hotel rooms and car rentals

Help your travel agency work smarter

Travelport Smartpoint will transform the way you work to maximize revenues, increase productivity and improve the customer experience.

Discover more about Help your travel agency work smarter
"With the branded fares and ancillaries, it's so much easier to find what is included in the purchased fares. I love that you can just click on a button and it tells you everything! I also book a lot of hotels for our customers and I love the feature that I can use to see what hotels are close to key points in those cities. Because of this feature, I won’t have to use Google or MapQuest as much as I have in the past"
Kristy Langley, Express Travel Manager, Meetings & Incentives Worldwide

Travelport Smartpoint

Find out how Travelport Smartpoint is redefining the selling experience

content: Skip to main content Travelport Smartpoint The ultimate travel retail technology Travelport Smartpoint is the ultimate travel retail technology for today’s connected digital age. It puts the world’s travel content at your fingertips and is packed with features that power better performance and enable you to create the perfect personalized service for your customers. With Travelport Smartpoint your travel agency will get: Agent efficiency We take away the complexity of managing system interactions, enabling your agents to spend more time selling and less time on administration. Comprehensive content We provide a wealth of content all in one place and tailor the search results to display the most relevant options for your travelers. A dedicated partner Travelport are committed to the success of every agency on our platform - big or small. We are always on hand to answer question and solve any challenges you face. Agency customization Our travel booking platform can be configured or customized to support your agency's way of working. All the tools you need, all the tools you know Hear how travel agent Brooke made the move to Travelport Smartpoint and has never looked back.
